Steven.en: Found in source code comment: "change the cats name to 'Steven'"
Steven.zh: 源代码注释里写的：“把猫的名字改成‘Steven’”

Godhead.en: While you're downed, you will revive with 50% HP at the end of the round.
Godhead.zh:
当你倒地后，
在回合结束时以 50% 的生命值复活。

DejaVu.en: Applies Deja Vu (10%); severe version replaces brain AI.
DejaVu.zh: 施加 10% 既视感；严重版会替换大脑 AI。
